comments.body:
@chkp-orso I can see u have defined `action_settings` as list and here in example u have written it as Dict, plz change it to list, otherwise this play Ansible will throw error:
```suggestion
    action_settings:
    - enable_identity_captive_portal: true
      limit: Upload_1Gbps
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +256,260 @@  cp_mgmt_access_rule:
    action: Ask
    action_settings:
      enable_identity_captive_portal: true
      limit: Upload_1Gbps
